metaDescription: Just enter how many kWh you need and find the best charging price on every stations.
title: Chargeprice - Check the best charging tariffs for your EVs
manageMyTariffsDescription: Select all tariffs that you own below.
errorPricesUnavailable: Prices unavailable. Please try to reload the page.
totalPriceInfo:
€ = Total price excl. monthly fees
* Calculated values incl. 10% charging drain. Actual values depend on vehicle, charging station, weather etc.
** Depending on tariff: Base fee, service fee, membership fee
showExclusiveProviderCustomerTariffsDeta: Some providers offer special tariffs for their house-hold energy customers
onlyShowMyTariffsDetail: Only stations where my tariffs are applicable or stations without previous registration are shown
feedbackContent: Do you miss any feature, charging tariff or did you encounter a bug? Feel free to reach out to me via email!
dataSourceContentGoingElectric: Charging stations (Coordinates, plugs, available charging cards, NO displayed charging prices): GoingElectric API
dataSourceContentPlugsurfing: Charging prices PlugSurfing: PlugSurfing API
dataSourceContentNewMotion: Charging prices New Motion: New Motion API
dataSourceContentOther: Other charging prices: Collected manually via websites of providers.
disclaimerContent: The provider of the website is not liable for the correctness of the displayed data. There is no guarantee on the displayed data. The prices should only be used for benchmarking.
plugcheckerToChargepriceContent:
Same features, different name!
The website www.plugchecker.com will of course continue to work, but the official new name is now www.chargeprice.app
unbalancedLoadDetail: Allow charging with more than 4.5 kW at AC stations for cars with uniphase AC charger
stationsWithAtLeast2ChargePoints: Stations with at least 2 charge points only
